name: Metro Warriors: Prologue
description:
Embark on an journey where being in the wrong place at the wrong time leads to brutal carnage with a strange and unusual weapon. 

OR 

Dive straight into the arena and fight to the death against your friends (or enemies) to see who is the true Disc-Master!

GAME MODES Tutorial

A short story introducing you to the world of Metro Warriors and the workings of the disc. 

  • Singleplayer
  • Learning to use the disc
  • Mouse and keyboard OR Controller support
  • Tony
Versus

Enter the arena and throw your disc like a lethal Beyblade. Take out your opponents and be the last one standing!

  • Play against a friend!
  • Local multiplayer* 
  • Controller support ONLY
  • Brutal and fast paced gameplay

*Use Parsec to play with a friend online!

FEATURES
  • Deadly Frisbees
  • Fast paced gameplay
  • High skill ceiling
  • Deadly obstacles
More to come!

Note: this is a prologue, expect changes in the full game!

Our journey is far from over, what we've released here is nothing but a taste of the full game we're developing RIGHT NOW!!! 

Get involved in the process!

Making a great game isn't easy, come tell us what you would like to see in the future!
